content.text:
Hey (@/aevMKXuaoz1ALVw0Iu86CyPWH1/kiwbrUbTRVPIhms=.ed25519, thanks for bringing up feed deletion.

There's been talk about [the ability to delete individual messages](%QJEpN8LN1t3BrIkUQ3WoOMWRsMArbVUZCpTeBYcuqfw=.sha256)  and [deleting an entire feed](%okZcNVCJnXW4IiT5eLBa9qQXFabYymlDGJ7lwplbsAc=.sha256), but neither have been implemented yet. Let me know if you have any questions!

mentions.name: the ability to delete individual messages
